title: Grateful Dead Live at The Spectrum on 1981-05-02
source: flac16/48kHz; Source Info: Jim Wise's Master Audience Cassettes; Sennheiser 421 mics > Sony TC-D5 (Maxell UD-XLII)(located at the soundboard); Transfer Info: Master Cassettes (Nakamichi Dragon)> Tascam DA-3000 (DSF 1-bit/5.6 MHz) > dBpoweramp (24-bit/96 kHz) > Adobe Audition 3.01 (24-bit/96 kHz) > TLH flac2496; 24-bit > 16-bit via dBpoweramp
